profile:
AM Group of Companies has been in operation since 1956 and is a 3rd generation family business.

We stand behind our work with one of the best warranties in the business, 10 years. This is only possible as a result of three things: the use of premium products, good workmanship and careful inspection of completed work.

AM Group of Companies hires only skilled workers who are regularly educated on installation methods and new materials. Our corporate education programs apply to all facets of the business.

Proudly situated in Guelph, London, Owen Sound, Gravenhurst and Collingwood, our size and office geography allow us to deliver corporate-grade professionalism while maintaining top rate local customer service.

AM Group of Companies Services:
Commercial Roofing
Residential Roofing
Fiberglass Shingles, Metal Roof, Flat Roof, Cedar Shakes & Shingles, Composite Roofing, Inspire, Owens Corning, Enviroshake.
Eavestrough, Soffit, Fascia and other Aluminum work
Attic Insulation, Blown In Insulation
Skylights, Velux
Ventilation
Roof repair & replacement
Siding
Windows & Doors
Vinyl Windows
Entry Doors
Patio Doors
 
Contact us today for a Free, no obligation estimate.
1-877-281-6900

email use for a free Estimates @ goldenphoenix.c.inc@gmail.com

We do jobs in Toronto, London, Oakville, Mississauga, kitchener, Hamilton, brampton, Woodstock, Milton, Ottawa, anywhere in Ontario

Your roof is your home’s first and final defense against the elements, so it’s important to ensure it’s up to the task when you’re putting in a new roof replacement Phoenix Construction Inc. Give us a call today.
services:
Our Services

Roofing intallation

Leave your roofing installation to us! Our roofer carefully installs flat roofs in and around North York, ON. Rest assured, our roofing service is the best in the business.

Roof maintenance

Regular roofing maintenance doesn’t just upkeep your curb appeal. It can save you money in the long run, preventing leaks and storm damage.

Commercial roofing service

Golden Phoenix Construction Inc offers a commercial roofing service to businesses in North York, ON and the surrounding areas. Whether you need shingle installation or repairs, our roofing contractor will take care of it.

Seamless gutters

Seamless gutters are perfect for preventing water damage to your home. Without seams, they’re much harder to break and much more reliable in the long run.
name: Golden Phoenix Construction Inc.

profile:
Our Story
 
Welcome! I am Josiah Gouin, proud owner of Dream Exteriors Canada and this is my family.

Ever since I was young, I have had a remarkable passion for home design and transforming the ordinary into the extraordinary.

Over the years I have had the privilege to work with some of the top companies in the exterior home renovation industry across North America and completed over 3,000 projects with homeowners redesigning and transforming their houses into their dream homes.

I recognized I had an opportunity with Dream Exteriors to positively change homeowners perceptions and experiences of working with a home renovation company. I personally embarked on a mission to build a company that committed to always putting the customer first. On that fundamental belief, Dream Exteriors Canada was born.

Founded on the principles of building and maintaining honest and trusting relationships with homeowners, Dream Exteriors is devoted on delivering quality customer service with the highest level of satisfaction guaranteed. I understand that developing a project with homeowners should be a unique and exciting experience as well as educational in order for them to be completely satisfied and committed to the changes they are making to their homes.

Dream Exteriors Canada puts YOU first.

From my family to yours, we would like to personally thank you for your interest in Dream Exteriors Canada and invite you to reach out should you have any further questions or wish to book a zero-hassle consultation.

Sincerely,

 

Josiah Gouin & Family
DREAM EXTERIORS CANADA
(519) 630-8161

profile:
Consumer Roofing and Solar has been proudly meeting the residential and commercial roofing needs of homeowners, businesses, building contractors, property managers, and anyone else requiring roofing services in London and South-Western Ontario for the past 35 years.  From shingles to flat roofs our team has experience with them all.
 
Solar / Renewable Energy
Consumer Roofing and Solar are works with an Ontario-based manufacturer (Welland, Ontario) of solar pv panels and wind micro-turbine cubes. We provide residential and business customers around the province with the latest technology in renewable energy.
 
By installing our products our customers are producing free green energy for themselves through the Net Metering program and can save up to 50% off their existing hydro bills or sale produced energy to local power authority through microFIT program and make significant montly income for the length of the contract.
 
Roofing
Our reputation is our principal sales tool.  We value it highly and protect it.  Talk to any of of our clients and they will tell you that they trust us and appreciate us.  We appreciate them and the many referrals that we have received from them over the years.
